verses.verse: And after <S%H310><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> there arose <S%H6965><s%> to defend <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> Tola <S%H8439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Puah <S%H6312><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>; and he lived <S%H3427><s%> in Shamir <S%H8069><s%> in mountain <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.
And he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Shamir <S%H8069><s%>.

And after <S%H310><s%> him arose <S%H6965><s%> Jair <S%H2971><s%>, a Gileadite <S%H1569><s%>, and judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And he had thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> that rode <S%H7392><s%> on thirty <S%H7970><s%> donkey colts <S%H5895><s%>, and they had thirty <S%H7970><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, which are called <S%H7121><s%> Havoth <S%H2334><s%>â€“jair unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, which are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.
And Jair <S%H2971><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Camon <S%H7056><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%>, and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>, and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%>, and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Zidon <S%H6721><s%>, and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and the gods <S%H430><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and forsook <S%H5800><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and served not him <S%H5647><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and he sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>.

And that year <S%H8141><s%> they troubled <S%H7492><s%> and oppressed <S%H7533><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: eighteen <S%H8083><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, which is in Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.

Moreover the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> also against Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and against Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, and against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>; so that Israel <S%H3478><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> distressed <S%H3334><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you <S%H5800><s%>, both because we have forsaken our God <S%H430><s%>, and also served <S%H5647><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Did not I deliver you from the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and from the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and from the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>?

The Zidonians <S%H6722><s%> also <S%H6002><s%>, and the Amalekites, and the Maonites <S%H4584><s%>, did oppress <S%H3905><s%> you <S%H6817><s%>; and you cried to me <S%H3467><s%>, and I delivered you out of their hand <S%H3027><s%>.
Yet you have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me <S%H5647><s%>, and served other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>: why I will deliver <S%H3467><s%> you no more <S%H3254><s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> unto the gods <S%H430><s%> which you have chosen <S%H977><s%>; let them <S%H1992><s%> deliver <S%H3467><s%> you in the time <S%H6256><s%> of your tribulation <S%H6869><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, We have sinned <S%H2398><s%>: do <S%H6213><s%> you unto us whatever seems <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto you <S%H5337><s%>; deliver us only <S%H3117><s%>, we pray you, this day.

And they put away <S%H5493><s%> the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> them <S%H5647><s%>, and served the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and his soul <S%H5315><s%> was grieved <S%H7114><s%> for the misery <S%H5999><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were gathered together <S%H6817><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilead <S%H1568><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled themselves together <S%H622><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> and princes <S%H8269><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H7453><s%>, What man <S%H376><s%> is he that will begin <S%H2490><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>? he shall be head <S%H7218><s%> over all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.
